info.description:
Beautiful Detailing
A striking contrast of textures and shapes with rounded arms, a deep pocketed seat and angular metal legs. A firm yet comfy sit.

Made For Sharing
Snuggle up or stretch out - this corner set comfortably seats up to six people. You can even separate the pieces to suit your set-up.

Family Friendly
Crafted from durable polyester, steel and wood - this sofa is made to last. Available in a range of contemporary colours.

Product Details.Filling: Seat - foam (28kg-35kg/cbm). Back - foam (25kg/cbm) and fibre

Product Details.Care: Removable back cushion covers - professional care only

Product Dimensions.General Dimensions: Total - W291 x D154/93 x H83cm

info.name: Vittorio Left Hand Facing Corner Sofa Group in anthracite grey
